= Getting the code =

I use a build system you are probably [http://code.google.com/p/fwtemplates/ not familiar with].  Therefore I would suggest the following:

  * grab the [http://fastapprox.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/fastapprox/src/fastonebigheader.h standalone one big header file] which works with both C or C++, or
  * get a release tarball

... or if you insist ...
